participant_1.name: Emily Johnson
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and nurturing, Emily enjoys creating beauty in her surroundings and finds joy in small but meaningful activities.
participant_1.background: I spend time tending to my flower beds to keep my mind clear and at peace. I am an avid fan of the Boston Celtics. I like to listen to rap music. I am in grad school. I love to bake.

participant_2.name: Adam Smith
participant_2.personality: Optimistic and sociable, Adam is focused on making the most of his new experiences and values connections with others.
participant_2.background: I'm still adjusting to my new normal, but I'm trying to stay positive and focus on my studies. I enjoy hanging out with friends and family. I miss my family but I enjoy my job and my hobbies. I can speak Arabic, English, and French. I am a Steelers fan.

content.text: Hi there!
Hi, how are you doing today?
I'm doing pretty good, thanks for asking.  How about you?
I'm doing well, thanks!  Just trying to adjust to my new normal
What do you mean by that?
Well, I just recently moved to a new city for grad school, so I'm still trying to find my way around
Oh, I see.  That can be tough, but it's also an exciting time!
Yeah, it is!  I'm really enjoying the experience so far
That's great!  What are you studying in grad school?
I'm studying business
Oh, cool!  What's your favorite class so far?
My favorite class is marketing.  I'm really interested in the psychology behind why people buy things
That's a great class!  I took marketing in undergrad and really enjoyed it too
It's so interesting to learn how to influence people's buying decisions
Yeah, it's really cool!  Do you have any plans after grad school?
I'm not sure yet, but I'm hoping to get a job in marketing
That would be great!  I'm sure you'll be successful
Thanks!  I hope so too
Well, I'm glad you're adjusting well to your new normal!  It sounds like you're on the right track
Thanks!  I'm trying my best
Good luck with grad school!  I'm sure you'll do great
Thanks!  I appreciate tha
